[options]="propertiesOptions" (selectionChanged)="applyFilters()"> [options]="manufacturerOptions" (selectionChanged)="applyFilters()">
{{ product.name }}
{{ product.manufacturer }}

  • {{ property }}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { HttpClient } from "@angular/common/http"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { products: any[] | undefined; filteredProducts: any[] | undefined; propertiesOptions: string[] | undefined; manufacturerOptions: string[] | undefined; selectedProperties: string[] = []; selectedManufacturers: string[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get("src/assets/products-data.json").subscribe((data) => { this.products = data; this.filteredProducts = data; this.propertiesOptions = this.getUniqueProperties(data); this.manufacturerOptions = this.getUniqueManufacturers(data); }); } getUniqueProperties(data: any[]): string[] { let properties: string[] = []; data.forEach((product) => { product.properties.forEach((property: string) => { if (!properties.includes(property)) { properties.push(property); } }); }); return properties; } getUniqueManufacturers(data: any[]): string[] { let manufacturers: string[] = []; data.forEach((product) => { if (!manufacturers.includes(product.manufacturer)) { manufacturers.push(product.manufacturer); } }); return manufacturers; } applyFilters(): void { let filteredByProperties = this.filterByProperties(this.products); let filteredByManufacturers = this.filterByManufacturers(this.products); this.filteredProducts = filteredByProperties.filter((product) => filteredByManufacturers.includes(product) ); } filterByProperties(products: any[]): any[] { if (this.selectedProperties.length === 0) { return products; } return products.filter((product) => { let matches = true; this.selectedProperties.forEach((property) => { if (!product.properties.includes(property)) { matches = false; } }); return matches; }); } filterByManufacturers(products: any[]): any[] { if (this.selectedManufacturers.length === 0) { return products; } return products.filter((product) => { return this.selectedManufacturers.includes(product.manufacturer); }); } }
